data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Price in Nigeria 2024, Full Specs & Review
data.meta_description: The latest updated Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge official, unofficial price in Nigeria 2024 and full specifications, News and Review at TechTalks.com.ng
data.meta_site_name: Tech Talks - Your Gateway to the Future of Technology
data.text:
Last Updated on July 27, 2024 by TechTalks

The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge, released in 2015, remains a notable device in the smartphone market due to its innovative design and robust features. It continues to attract attention in Nigeria, particularly among users seeking a blend of performance and affordability. This article provides a comprehensive overview of the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge, including its main features, current price in Nigeria, full specifications, and answers to frequently asked questions.

Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Main Features

Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Current Price in Nigeria 2024

The current price of the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge in Nigeria ranges between ₦180,000 and ₦225,000 for new units. For used or refurbished units, the price typically ranges from ₦130,000 to ₦145,000, depending on the condition and storage capacity.

Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Full Specifications

The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge is known for its dual-edge display, powerful Exynos 7420 processor, and high-resolution camera. It offers a premium design with a glass and metal build, making it a stylish yet functional device.

General Info

Body Design

Hardware & Software

Connectivity

Other Features

Conclusion

The Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge remains a compelling choice for users in Nigeria, offering a blend of premium design, robust performance, and a high-quality camera. Despite being an older model, its unique dual-edge display and solid build quality continue to make it a desirable option for those seeking a reliable smartphone at an affordable price.

Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge FAQs

What is the current price of the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge in Nigeria?

The current price ranges between ₦180,000 and ₦225,000 for new units, and ₦130,000 to ₦145,000 for used units.

Does the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge support wireless charging?

Yes, the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge supports wireless charging.

What is the battery capacity of the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge?

The battery capacity is 2600 mAh.

Can the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge be upgraded to a newer Android version?

Yes, it can be upgraded to Android 7.0 (Nougat).

Does the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge have a microSD card slot?

No, the Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge does not have a microSD card slot.
